resources.string: Too many failed attempts, please request for a new verification code from the website after 30 secs and retry again. You may also switch to SMS OTP or OneyKey OTP to access your account.
Please authenticate with your fingerprint to continue
You have recently added / deleted fingerprint from this device. Please re-link your device with FSM to re-enable the feature.
Lockscreen is disabled or lockscreen setting is changed, to continue using trusted device feature, you need to enable the lockscreen.
To safeguard your login, please verify the six-digit code shown below.
We have detected unusual activity with your trusted device. Please re-link your device for security purpose.
This device is currently not linked to your FSMOne Account as a trusted device. Proceed to link this device.
Please switch country back to SG to use this feature.
The code has passed its validity period, please request again.

This 2FA key will expire in 60 seconds.
We will never ask you for this code if you are not logging in.
Never share it with anyone.
Attention: Anyone who links a fingerprint on this device can use this device to login to your account.

1. This device has been linked to your FSMOne account. This page allows you to authenticate your web login via this trusted device.

2. To do so, login from FSMOne Website and choose "Login with Trusted Device" as 2FA authentication method.

3. Select the trusted device you wish to authenticate with. A push nofication will be sent to this trusted device and a 6-digit code will be shown on this page.

4. In the event of no push notification being sent, you can proceed to the homepage of FSM Mobile App, click on the top left icon to open this page. A 6-digit code will be shown for you to compare before you proceed to authorize your web login.
